channel.title: How do I convert a blue signal to yellow?
channel.description: Hey :) I am trying to make an lfo retrigger a sequencer and for that I need to convert a blue signal into a yellow signal. It doesnt work putting the lfo directly into the restart input like on the picture. How would I go about converting blue to yellow? Thanks :smile:

item.title: How do I convert a blue signal to yellow?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

If you connect a blue ("cv") signal to a yellow ("trigger/gate") input, it will evaluate to true if the signal is greater than zero, false otherwise.

This is different than in C/C++ (where anything except zero will convert to true), but I think this is the expected behavior in a modular environment.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I convert a blue signal to yellow?
